meta.content: Woodford County Special Education Association, WCSEA, is a special education cooperative servicing eight school districts within Woodford County, Illinois.

font.strong: WCSEA is a special education joint agreement that provides a full continuum of specialeducation
services to eight school districts in Woodford County, Illinois.

font.font: ~ Providing a Foundation From Which To Grow ~

blockquote.font:
The staff of Woodford County Special Education Association are committed to serving the students, families and staff members of eight member districts in Woodford County. WCSEA is known for innovative practices and our professionals continue this tradition of providing high quality services to students with or at-risk of having disabilities. Our dedicated staff is committed to excellence and we look forward to the continued partnership with school district staff and families in order to prepare students for the world in the 21st century.
~ Eric Scroggs, Executive Director

strong.span: WCSEA is closed per state mandate until further notice
